name: Pacaur
tagline: A fast workflow AUR helper using cower as backend
body:
### Philosophy
> pacaur is an Arch User Repository (AUR) helper aiming at speed and simplicity, designed to minimize user prompt interaction and to use an uncluttered interface.

### Dependencies
* [cower](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/cower/), a minimal AUR helper
* [expac](https://www.archlinux.org/packages/?sort=&q=expac), a pacman database extraction utility
* [sudo](https://www.archlinux.org/packages/?sort=&q=sudo), for privileges management

### Get the package
* [pacaur](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages.php?ID=49145) (stable version)
* [pacaur-git](https://aur.archlinux.org/packages.php?ID=54046) (development version)

### Documentation
* [Installation](https://github.com/Spyhawk/pacaur/wiki)
* [Man page](https://github.com/Spyhawk/pacaur/blob/master/README.pod)

### License
GPL

### Support and Contact
Need help? Have a look at 
* the [Arch Wiki](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Pacaur) page
* the [Arch forums](https://bbs.archlinux.org/viewtopic.php?id=119473) thread
* the [GitHub issues](https://github.com/Spyhawk/pacaur) tracker
